text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate explicitly states that one way to justify the requested provisions to the founders is by asserting that they are 'Market standard in 90%+ of German VC Series A deals' (for Drag-Along) and 'Prevalent in 70% of German VC deals' (for Anti-Dilution), and generally referencing 'Market norm' and 'Standard in EU VC'.
